trans-unit.source: Defines a reusable object that sends output to a printer, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Define um objeto reutilizável que envia saída para uma impressora, quando imprimir a partir de um aplicativo Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create an instance of the PrintDocument class, set properties such as the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>, and call the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method to start the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você pode criar uma instância da classe PrintDocument, que você pode definir propriedades, como o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>e chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A>método para iniciar o processo de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DocumentName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event where you specify the output to print, by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento em que você especificar que a saída de impressão, usando a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing from a Windows Form application, see the [Windows Forms Print Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a impressão de um aplicativo de formulário do Windows, consulte o [suporte de impressão do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser imprimir a partir de um aplicativo do Windows Presentation Foundation, consulte o <xref:System.Printing>namespace.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields based upon the default printer.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa todos os campos com base na impressora padrão.

trans-unit.source: Typically, after creating a new <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, you set printer and page settings that affect the output through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, depois de criar um novo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, defina as configurações de impressora e a página que afetam a saída por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>método é chamado e antes da primeira página do documento será impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you handle the BeginPrint event to initialize fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você pode tratar o evento BeginPrint para inicializar fontes, fluxos de arquivos e outros recursos usados durante o processo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>delegar para o evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos com delegados, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets page settings that are used as defaults for all pages to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as configurações de página que são usadas como padrões para todas as páginas a serem impressas.

trans-unit.source: You can specify several default page settings through the DefaultPageSettings property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar várias configurações de página padrão por meio da propriedade DefaultPageSettings.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies whether the page prints in color, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies landscape or portrait orientation, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specifies the margins of the page.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade especifica se a página será impressa na cor, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade especifica a orientação de paisagem ou retrato e o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade especifica as margens da página.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event and modify the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> argument included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar as configurações de página por página, tratar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>eventos e modificar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A>argumento incluído na <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectivamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After printing has started, changes to page settings through the DefaultPageSettings property will not affect pages being printed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Depois de iniciar a impressão, as alterações nas configurações de página por meio da propriedade DefaultPageSettings não afetará as páginas seja impressas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> that specifies the default page settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> que especifica as configurações de página padrão para o documento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the document name to display (for example, in a print status dialog box or printer queue) while printing the document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do documento para exibir (por exemplo, em um status de impressão diálogo caixa ou impressora fila) ao imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: The DocumentName property does not specify the file to print.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade NomeDoDocumento não especifica o arquivo para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: Rather, you specify the output to print by handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, você pode especificar a saída de impressão manipulando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The document name to display while printing the document.
trans-unit.target: O nome do documento para exibir ao imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: The default is "document".
trans-unit.target: O padrão é "documentos".

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the last page of the document has printed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a última página do documento foi impresso.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you handle the EndPrint event to release fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process, like fonts.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você pode tratar o evento EndPrint para liberar fontes, fluxos de arquivos e outros recursos usados durante o processo de impressão, como fontes.

trans-unit.source: You indicate that there are no more pages to print by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `false` in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Você indica que não existem mais páginas para imprimir, definindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `false` no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The EndPrint event also occurs if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: O evento EndPrint também ocorre se o processo de impressão foi cancelado ou ocorrerá uma exceção durante o processo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>delegar para o evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos com delegados, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is called after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*> method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>método é chamado e antes da primeira página do documento será impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print*>

trans-unit.source: The OnBeginPrint method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnBeginPrint permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnBeginPrint method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma classe derivada chama o método OnBeginPrint, ele gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>evento invocando o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is called when the last page of the document has printed.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado quando a última página do documento foi impresso.

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnEndPrint permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method is also called if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: O método OnEndPrint também é chamado se o processo de impressão foi cancelado ou ocorrerá uma exceção durante o processo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnEndPrint method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma classe derivada chama o método OnEndPrint, ele gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>evento invocando o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is called before a page prints.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado antes de uma página impressa.

trans-unit.source: The OnPrintPage method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPrintPage permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnPrintPage method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma classe derivada chama o método OnPrintPage, ele gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento invocando o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is called immediately before each <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado imediatamente antes de cada <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnQueryPageSettings method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnQueryPageSettings também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class calls the OnQueryPageSettings method, it raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event by invoking the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma classe derivada chama o método OnQueryPageSettings, ele gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>evento invocando o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the position of a graphics object associated with a page is located just inside the user-specified margins or at the top-left corner of the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a posição de um objeto de gráfico associado a uma página está localizada dentro das margens de usuário especificado ou no canto superior esquerdo da área de impressão da página.

trans-unit.source: Calculating the area available to print requires knowing the physical size of the paper, the margins for the page, and the location of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object origin.
trans-unit.target: Calcular a área disponível para impressão requer a saber o tamanho físico do papel, as margens da página e o local do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>origem do objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OriginAtMargins is `true`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object location takes into account the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value and the printable area of the page.
trans-unit.target: Quando for OriginAtMargins `true`, o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>local do objeto leva em conta a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o valor da propriedade e da área de impressão da página.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OriginAtMargins is `false`, only the printable area of the page is used to determine the location of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object origin, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Quando for OriginAtMargins `false`, somente a área de impressão da página é usada para determinar o local do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto de origem, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor é ignorado.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, if OriginAtMargins is `true`, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set for 1 inch on each side, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> is located 1 inch from the left and top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se for OriginAtMargins `true`, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é definido para 1 polegada em cada lado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto incluído no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>está localizada 1 polegada da esquerda e da parte superior da página.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the printable area of the page is .25 of an inch on each side and OriginAtMargins is `false`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object is located .25 of an inch from the left and top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Se a área de impressão da página é.25 de polegada em cada lado e OriginAtMargins `false`, o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto está localizado.25 de polegada da esquerda e da parte superior da página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The printable area of a page varies from printer to printer and is not guaranteed to be symmetrical.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Da área de impressão da página varia da impressora e não é garantia de ser simétricos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the graphics origin starts at the page margins; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the graphics origin is at the top-left corner of the printable page.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a origem do elemento gráfico começa com as margens de página; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a origem dos elementos gráficos está no canto superior esquerdo da página pode ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Starts the document's printing process.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de impressão do documento.

trans-unit.source: Specify the output to print by handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event and by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Especifique a saída de impressão manipulando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>eventos e usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>incluídos em <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify which printer should print the document.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para especificar qual impressora deve imprimir o documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Print method prints the document without using a print dialog.
trans-unit.target: O método de impressão imprime o documento sem usar uma caixa de diálogo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when you want to offer the user the ability to choose print settings.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando você deseja oferecer ao usuário a capacidade de escolher as configurações de impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception that is not handled by the Print method is thrown during printing, the printing of the document is aborted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se uma exceção não tratada pelo método de impressão é lançada durante a impressão, a impressão do documento será anulada.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the print controller that guides the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o controlador da impressora que orienta o processo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: A print controller guides the printing process in several ways.
trans-unit.target: Um controlador de impressão orienta o processo de impressão de várias maneiras.

trans-unit.source: For example, to print a document, you need to convert it to a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para imprimir um documento, você precisa convertê-lo para um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> specifies where to draw the graphic in an image for a print preview or on a printer to actually print the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>Especifica onde desenhar o elemento gráfico em uma imagem de uma visualização de impressão ou em uma impressora, na verdade, imprimir o documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>

trans-unit.source: A print controller can also specify whether to print a document immediately, or wait a specified interval.
trans-unit.target: Um controlador de impressão também pode especificar se deseja imprimir um documento imediatamente ou aguardar um intervalo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> that guides the printing process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> que orienta o processo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The default is a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer that prints the document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a impressora que imprime o documento.

trans-unit.source: You can specify several printer settings through the PrinterSettings property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar várias configurações de impressora por meio da propriedade PrinterSettings.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the number of copies you want to print, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the printer to use, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the range of pages you want to print.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, use a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para especificar o número de cópias que deseja imprimir, a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para especificar a impressora para uso e a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para especificar o intervalo de páginas que deseja imprimir.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> that specifies where and how the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> que especifica onde e como o documento será impresso.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> with its properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> com suas propriedades definidas para seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the output to print for the current page is needed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a saída de impressão da página atual for necessário.

trans-unit.source: To specify the output to print, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar a saída de impressão, use a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify a line of text that should be printed, draw the text using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para especificar uma linha de texto que deve ser impresso, desenhar o texto usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In addition to specifying the output, you can indicate if there are additional pages to print by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Além de especificar a saída, você pode indicar se há páginas adicionais para imprimir, definindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`, which indicates that there are no more pages to print.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é `false`, que indica que não existem mais páginas para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: Individual page settings can also be modified through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and the print job can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Configurações de página individuais também podem ser modificadas por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>e o trabalho de impressão pode ser cancelado definindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: To print each page of a document using different page settings, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> event.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir cada página de um documento usando as configurações de página diferentes, tratar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler>delegar para o evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos com delegados, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before each <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente antes de cada <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings.
trans-unit.target: É possível imprimir cada página de um documento usando as configurações de página diferentes.

trans-unit.source: You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or by setting the property to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Definir configurações de página, modificando as propriedades individuais do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade ou definindo a propriedade <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs.PageSettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> affect only the current page, not the document's default page settings.
trans-unit.target: As alterações feitas a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>afetam apenas a página atual, não as configurações do documento padrão página.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: The print job can also be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` for the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O trabalho de impressão também pode ser cancelado, definindo a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true` para <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler> delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler>delegar para o evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos com delegados, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the print document, in string form.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre o documento de impressão, na forma de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres.
